contact.description: If you prefer to contact us directly, here are our details:

questions.question: What level of Spanish do I need to start?
questions.answer: None! We have courses for all levels, from absolute beginners (A1) to advanced (C2).

questions.question: What are online classes like?
questions.answer: Classes are held via Google Meets with interactive materials. Our teachers use digital resources and dynamic activities tailored to your specific needs.

questions.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a class?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before the class at no additional cost. Cancellations with less than 24 hours’ notice are subject to our cancellation policy.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. You can choose between monthly plans or class packages to suit your needs.
